wordquizzle.wqserver

Class Reactor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • wordquizzle.wqserver.Reactor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Reactor
extends java.lang.Thread
    The Reactor class implements a sort of Reactor pattern for handling reads and writes on a stream socket.
